preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine 20.00 g of Calcium, 10.00 g of Germanium, 8.00 g of Sodium, and 16.00 g of Phosphorus. 
 2. Gradually add 50.00 g of distilled water to the dry mixture while stirring continuously to ensure a uniform consistency.
